title: fry
description: Chicken thighs are more flavourful than breasts and a lot cheaper, perfect if you're solo cooking on a budget. Each serving provides 404kcal, 23g protein, 20g carbohydrate (of which 20g sugars), 25g fat (of which 4g saturates), 2.6g fibre and	2.3g salt.
ingredients: 100g/3½oz chicken thigh meat, scored with a sharp knife
¼ leek, sliced into long thin strips
¼ red pepper, sliced into long thin strips
